page.title: 11My Dad's Day
page.content: My dad's name is Barry.He works with a company that cleans carpets.On a work day he has to get up at 6.30. Then he gets washed and dressed and comes down stairs ready for breakfast. He has cornflakes followed by tea and toast. Then he gets into the car and heads for work. He arrives at 8.30. He gets phone calls from his clients every minute of the day. He often leaves the office to go and see a client. At lunch_time if he is not too busy he will go to the pub and have lunch. After lunch he is busy again with phone calls, meetings and visits. He has to pay the wages on Thursdays and Fridays so he is sometimes late home. Usually though he is home in time to have dinner with us in the evening.
